document.full_text: china on tuesday blocked the publication of a u.n. expert panel's report that suggests north korea and iran have been sharing ballistic missile technology in violation of u.n. sanctions, diplomats said.
document.title: china blocks u.n. report on n.korea-iran ties: envoys
lines_and_colors: china on tuesday blocked the publication of a u.n. expert panel's report that suggests north korea and iran have been sharing ballistic missile technology in violation of u.n. sanctions, diplomats said.
